        public PDFView.PDFPos vGetPos(int vx,
                     int vy)
        get Position from point in view coordinate, implement in derived class.

        vx -
        vy -
        Returns:
        position in PDF coordinate.

      • vSetLock

        public void vSetLock(int lock)
        set locks
        Parameters:
        lock - 0: non-lock.
        1: lock horizontal moving.
        2: lock vertical moving.
        3: lock moving.
        4: lock resize.
        5: lock zooming.

      • vGetLock

        public int vGetLock()
        return lock status.
        Returns:
        0: non-lock.
        1: lock horizontal moving.
        2: lock vertical moving.
        3: lock moving.
        4: lock resize.
        5: lock zooming.
